author: daxian-dbw
body: Merge beta.7 release branch to master. Make sure choose the option "**Create a merge commit**" to merge this PR, so the tag can be easily synced to clients with a fetch.

comments.author: daxian-dbw
comments.body: The windows package names are updated. Please take another look. It's easier to just review the last commit.

title: Merge beta.7 release branch to master
